Name: Kitsune Slasher
About the game: Play as Kitty, a kitsune whose speed and dexterity. Slice up a variety of enemies such as slimes, gorillas, and a cactus with a gun! With only her sword by her side, will Kitty be able to end the curse that corrupts the land? Features • Foxes • Slimes • Flash Stylized Hack 'n' Slash Platformer • 30 Levels, each with their own style music. • 10 Challenging Bosses • An expanding updating world
